Title: SHINOLA WATCH BIRDY 34MM DOUBLE WRAP ROSE TONE
Description: SHINOLA WATCH BIRDY 34MM DOUBLE WRAP ROSE TONEPREOWNED. This American made watch was a classic the day it was born! The heavy gauge stainless steel body, combined with the gorgeous rose-tone case makes this feminine and chic. The red double-wrap strap with rose-tone buckle make this highly adjustable and on trend for that layered look we love. This is free of scratches. This item retailed at $525. Shinola is manufactured out of Detroit, Michigan and engages artisans for its employees. It is a true success story illustrating that fine watches can be made state side. While they do use Swiss movement, the assembly and design take place here. The Birdy is just the right size at 34mm, not too small to be demure, but not so big you cannot lift your wrist! Strap width is 8mm, just right for layering bracelets. This is for the watch only, sorry no box or papers. Excellent working condition.
